1. Home
  2. Media Home

Media Home

The Media page is used to upload and manage videos and to create series and seasons.

Upload Videos

Click Upload Videos at the bottom of the left navigation.

Show me how

Search Videos
To search for a series, season, episode or movie, enter search terms and press enter. The following video fields will be searched:
  • Video id
  • Name
  • Short description
  • Long description
  • Tags
  • Reference id
  • Custom fields
Edit Video Details for Multiple Videos
Quick Edit is used to edit the video details for multiple videos. Click Quick Edit.

Show me how

Add a Video to a Folder
Folders can be used to organize videos.

Show me how

Create a Manual Playlist

Manual Playlists can be created to group a series of videos where you control the order of playback.

Show me how

Create a Smart Playlist

Smart Playlists can be created to automatically group a series of videos based upon video tag.

Show me how
